data.title: "Kill Bill: Vol. 2" Turns 15: A Look at One of Cinema’s Greatest Villains
data.meta_description: Female film critic Kimber Myers discusses Kill Bill: Vol. 2. There’s plenty to celebrate for the 15th anniversary of Quentin Tarantino’s Kill Bill: Vol. 2, but one aspect that’s often overlooked in the film’s many fight sequences and movie homages is Daryl Hannah’s character, Elle Driver.
